content: That's a lot of great ideas! I especially like the grilled corn salad and the quinoa salad with grilled veggies. I'm also intrigued by the baked beans with a smoky twist - I've been meaning to experiment with different BBQ sauce recipes, speaking of which, I had a huge hit with my new BBQ sauce recipe at my last backyard BBQ, where I served up a variety of grilled meats and veggies, including burgers, hot dogs, chicken breasts, and skewers of bell peppers and onions. Do you have any suggestions for unique BBQ sauce flavors or ingredients I could try out?
